original: tac śāstrakāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇy aneka-dharma-abhyupagame api yas tadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: tat śāstra kāreṇa tasmin dharmiṇi aneka dharma abhyupagame api yaḥ tadā tena vādinā dharmaḥ svayam sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ

original: sa eva sādhyo na itara ity uktaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: saḥ eva sādhyaḥ na itaraḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: 03045 iṣṭa iti yatra arthe vivādena sādhanam upanyastaṃ tasya siddhim icchatā so anukto api vacanena sādhyaḥ.
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ iti yatra arthe vivādena sādhanam upanyastam tasya siddhim icchatā saḥ anuktaḥ api vacanena sādhyaḥ
tad adhikaraṇa tvāt vivādasya

original: 03047 yathā parārthaś cakṣur-ādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc śayana-āsana-ādy-aṅga-vad iti. atra
analyzed: yathā para arthaḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṃghāta tvāt śayana āsana ādi aṅga vat iti atra

original: ātma-arthā ity anuktāv apy ātma-arthatā sādhyā. tena na ukta-mātram eva sādhyam ity uktaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: ātma arthāḥ iti anuktau api ātma artha tā sādhyā tena na ukta mātram eva sādhyam iti uktam bhavati
anirākṛtaḥ iti

original: etal-lakṣaṇa-yoge api yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭo apy arthaḥ pratyakṣa-anumāna-pratīti-sva-vacanair nirākriyate,
analyzed: etad lakṣaṇa yoge api yaḥ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ api arthaḥ pratyakṣa anumāna pratīti sva vacanaiḥ nirākriyate
na sa pakṣaḥ iti pradarśana artham
tatra pratyakṣa nirākṛtaḥ yathā
aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti
anumāna nirākṛtaḥ yathā
nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti
pratīti nirākṛtaḥ yathā
acandraḥ śaśī iti
sva vacana nirākṛtaḥ yathā
na anumānam pramāṇam
iti catvāraḥ pakṣābhāsāḥ nirākṛtāḥ bhavanti
evam siddhasya
asiddhasya api sādhana tvena abhimatasya
svayam vādinā tadā sādhayitum aniṣṭasya

original: ukta-mātrasya ca viparyayeṇa sādhyaḥ. tena eva svarūpeṇa abhimato vādina iṣṭo anirākṛtaḥ pakṣa iti pakṣa-lakṣaṇam anavadyaṃ darśitaṃ bhavati.
analyzed: ukta mātrasya ca viparyayeṇa sādhyaḥ tena eva sva rūpeṇa abhimataḥ vādinaḥ iṣṭaḥ anirākṛtaḥ pakṣaḥ iti pakṣa lakṣaṇam anavadyam darśitam bhavati

original: 03055 trirūpaliṅga-ākhyānaṃ parārtha-anumānam ity uktam. tatra trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekasya api rūpasya anuktau sādhanābhāsaḥ.
analyzed: tri rūpa liṅga ākhyānam para artha anumānam iti uktam tatra trayāṇām rūpāṇām ekasya api rūpasya anuktau sādhana ābhāsaḥ

original: 03056 uktāv apy asiddhau sandehe vā pratipādya-pratipādakayoḥ.
analyzed: api

original: 03057 ekasya rūpasya dharmi-sambandhasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddho hetvābhāsāḥ.
analyzed: ekasya rūpasya dharmi sambandhasya asiddhau sandehe vā asiddhaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ

original: 03058 yathā, anityaḥ śabda iti sādhye cākṣuṣatvam ubhaya-asiddham.
analyzed: yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti sādhye cākṣuṣa tvam ubhaya asiddham

original: 03059 cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarva-tvag-apaharaṇe maraṇaṃ prativādy-asiddham,
analyzed: cetanāḥ taravaḥ iti sādhye sarva tvac apaharaṇe maraṇam prativādi asiddham
vijñāna aindriya āyuḥ nirodha lakṣaṇasya maraṇasya anena abhyupagamāt
tasya ca taruṣu asambhavāt

original: 03060 acetanāḥ sukha-ādaya iti sādhye utpattimatvaṃ vā sāṃkhyasya svayaṃ vādino asiddham.
analyzed: acetanāḥ sukha ādayaḥ iti sādhye utpattimatvam vā sāṃkhyasya svayam vādinaḥ asiddham

original: 03061 tathā svayaṃ tad-āśrayaṇasya vā sandehe asiddhaḥ.
analyzed: tathā svayam tad āśrayaṇasya vā sandehe asiddhaḥ

original: 03062 yathā bāṣpa-ādi-bhāvena sandihyamāno bhūta-saṃghāto agni-siddhāv upadiśyamānaḥ sandigdha-asiddhaḥ.
analyzed: yathā bāṣpa ādi bhāvena sandihyamānaḥ bhūta saṃghātaḥ agni siddhau upadiśyamānaḥ sandigdha asiddhaḥ

original: 03063 yathā iha nikuñje mayūraḥ kekāyitād iti.
analyzed: yathā iha nikuñje mayūraḥ kekāyitāt iti
tad āpāta deśa vibhrame
dharmya siddhau api asiddhaḥ

original: yathā sarvagata ātmā iti sādhye sarvatra upalambhamāna-guṇatvam.
analyzed: yathā sarva gataḥ ātmā iti sādhye sarvatra upalambhamāna guṇa tvam

original: 03066 tathā ekasya rūpasya asapakṣe asattvasya asiddhāv anaikāntiko hetvābhāsaḥ.
analyzed: tathā ekasya rūpasya a sapakṣe asattvasya asiddhau anaikāntikaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ

original: 03067 yathā śabdasya anityatva-ādike dharme sādhye prameyatva-ādiko dharmaḥ sapakṣa-vipakṣayoḥ sarvatra ekadeśe vā vartamānaḥ.
analyzed: yathā śabdasya anitya tva ādike dharme sādhye prameya tva ādikaḥ dharmaḥ sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sarvatra eka deśe vā vartamānaḥ

original: 03068 tathā, asya eva rūpasya sandehe apy anaikāntika eva.
analyzed: tathā asya eva rūpasya sandehe api anaikāntikaḥ eva

original: 03069 yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāga-ādimān vā sādhye vaktṛtva-ādiko dharmaḥ sandigdha-vipakṣa-vyāvṛttikaḥ.
analyzed: yathā asarvajñaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ rāga ādimān vā sādhye vaktṛ tva ādikaḥ dharmaḥ sandigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttikaḥ

original: 03070 sarvajño vaktā na upalabhyate ity evaṃprakārasya anupalambhasya adṛśya-ātma-viṣayatvena sandeha-hetutvāt. tato asarvajña-viparyayād vaktṛtva-āder  #
analyzed: sarvajñaḥ vaktā na upalabhyate iti evaṃprakārasya anupalambhasya adṛśya ātma viṣaya tvena sandeha hetu tvāt tatas asarvajña viparyayāt vaktṛ tva ādeḥ
vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā

original: 03071 vaktṛtva-sarvajñatvayor virodha-abhāvāc ca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavati ity adarśane api vyatireko na sidhyati sandehāt.
analyzed: vaktṛ tva sarvajña tvayoḥ virodha abhāvāt ca yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sa vaktā na bhavati iti adarśane api vyatirekaḥ na sidhyati sandehāt
dvividhaḥ hi padārthānām virodhaḥ
avikala kāraṇasya bhavataḥ anya bhāve abhāvāt virodha gatiḥ
śīta auṣṇa sparśavat
paraspara parihāra sthita lakṣaṇa tayā vā bhāva abhāva vat

original: 03076 sa ca dvividho api virodho vaktṛtva-sarvajñatvayor na sambhavati.
analyzed: sa ca dvividhaḥ api virodhaḥ vaktṛ tva sarvajña tvayoḥ na sambhavati

original: 03077 na ca aviruddha-vidher anupalabdhāv apy abhāva-gatiḥ.
analyzed: na ca aviruddha vidheḥ anupalabdhau api abhāva gatiḥ
rāga ādīnām vacana ādeḥ ca kārya kāraṇa bhāva asiddheḥ

original: 03079 arthāntarasya ca akāraṇasya nivṛttau na vacana-āder nivṛttiḥ.
analyzed: artha antarasya ca akāraṇasya nivṛttau na vacana ādeḥ nivṛttiḥ
iti sandigdha vyatirekaḥ anaikāntikaḥ vacana ādiḥ
dvayoḥ rūpayoḥ viparyaya siddhau viruddhaḥ
kayoḥ dvayoḥ
sapakṣe sattvasya

original: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ ca nityatve sādhye viruddho hetvābhāsaḥ.
analyzed: yathā kṛtaka tvam prayatna ānantarīyaka tvam ca nitya tve sādhye viruddhaḥ hetvābhāsaḥ

a sapakṣe ca sattvam iti viparyaya siddhiḥ

original: 03086 nanu ca tṛtīyo api iṣṭa-vighāta-kṛd viruddhaḥ.

original: 03087 yathā parārthāś cakṣur-ādayaḥ saṃghātatvāc śayana-āsana-ādy-aṅga-vad iti.
analyzed: yathā para arthāḥ cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ saṃghāta tvāt śayana āsana ādi aṅga vat iti
tat iṣṭa saṃhata pārārthya viparyaya sādhanāt viruddhaḥ
saḥ iha kasmāt na uktaḥ
anayoḥ antarbhāvāt

original: 03091 na hy ayam ābhyāṃ sādhya-viparyaya-sādhanatvena bhidyate.
analyzed: na hi ayam ābhyām sādhya viparyaya sādhana tvena bhidyate

original: 03092 na hi iṣṭa-uktayoḥ sādhyatvena kaścid viśeṣa iti.
analyzed: na hi iṣṭa uktayoḥ sādhya tvena kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti

original: 03093 dvayo rūpayor ekasya asiddhāv aparasya ca sandehe anaikāntikaḥ.
analyzed: dvayoḥ rūpayoḥ ekasya asiddhau aparasya ca sandehe anaikāntikaḥ
yathā vīta rāgaḥ kaścid sarvajñaḥ vā
vaktṛ tvāt iti vyatirekaḥ atra asiddhaḥ

original: 03095 sarvajña-vīta-rāgayor viprakarṣād vacana-ādes tatra sattvam asattvaṃ vā sandigdham.
analyzed: sarvajña vīta rāgayoḥ viprakarṣāt vacana ādeḥ tatra sattvam asattvam vā sandigdham

original: 03096 anayor eva dvayo rūpayoḥ sandehe anaikāntikaḥ.
analyzed: anayoḥ eva dvayoḥ rūpayoḥ sandehe anaikāntikaḥ
yathā sa ātmakam jīvat śarīram prāṇa ādimat tvāt iti

original: 03098 na hi sātmaka-nirātmakābhyām anyo rāśir asti yatra ayaṃ prāṇa-ādir vartate.
analyzed: na hi sātmaka nirātmakābhyām anyaḥ rāśiḥ asti yatra ayam prāṇa ādiḥ vartate

na api anayoḥ ekatra vṛtti niścayaḥ

original: 03101 sātmakatvena anātmakatvena vā prasiddhe prāṇa-āder asiddheḥ.
analyzed: sātmaka tvena anātmaka tvena vā prasiddhe prāṇa ādeḥ asiddheḥ

original: 03102 tasmāj jīvaccharīra-sambandhī prāṇa-ādiḥ sātmakād anātmakāc ca sarvasmād vyāvṛttatvena asiddhes tābhyāṃ na vyatiricyate.
analyzed: tasmāt jīvat śarīra sambandhī prāṇa ādiḥ sātmakāt anātmakāt ca sarvasmāt vyāvṛtta tvena asiddheḥ tābhyām na vyatiricyate
na tatra anveti
eka ātmani api asiddheḥ

original: 03105 na api sātmakād anātmakāc ca tasya anvaya-vyatirekayor abhāva-niścayaḥ.
analyzed: na api sātmakāt anātmakāt ca tasya anvaya vyatirekayoḥ abhāva niścayaḥ

original: 03107 anvaya-vyatirekayor anyonya-vyavaccheda-rūpatvāt. tata eva anvaya-vyatirekayoḥ sandehād anaikāntikāḥ.
analyzed: anvaya vyatirekayoḥ anyonya vyavaccheda rūpa tvāt tatas eva anvaya vyatirekayoḥ sandehāt anaikāntikāḥ
sādhya etarayoḥ atas niścaya abhāvāt

original: 03109 evam eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ rūpāṇām ekaikasya dvayor dvayor vā rūpayor asiddhau sandehe vā yathāyogam asiddha-viruddha-anaikāntikās trayo hetvābhāsāḥ.
analyzed: evam eṣām trayāṇām rūpāṇām ekaikasya dvayoḥ dvayoḥ vā rūpayoḥ asiddhau sandehe vā yathāyogam asiddha viruddha anaikāntikāḥ trayaḥ hetvābhāsāḥ

original: 03110 viruddhāvyabhicāry api saṃśaya-hetur uktaḥ. sa iha kasmān na uktaḥ.
analyzed: viruddha avyabhicārī api saṃśaya hetuḥ uktaḥ saḥ iha kasmāt na uktaḥ
anumāna viṣaye asambhavāt

original: 03112 na hi sambhavo asti kārya-svabhāvayor ukta-lakṣaṇayor anupalambhasya ca viruddhatāyāḥ.
analyzed: na hi sambhavaḥ asti kārya svabhāvayoḥ ukta lakṣaṇayoḥ anupalambhasya ca viruddha tāyāḥ
na ca anyaḥ avyabhicārī

original: 03114 tasmād avastu-darśana-bala-pravṛttam āgama-āśrayam anumānam āśritya tad-artha-vicāreṣu viruddhāvyabhicārī sādhana-doṣa uktaḥ.
analyzed: tasmāt avastu darśana bala pravṛttam āgama āśrayam anumānam āśritya tad artha vicāreṣu viruddha avyabhicārī sādhana doṣaḥ uktaḥ
śāstra kārāṇām artheṣu bhrāntyā viparīta svabhāva aupasaṃhāra sambhavāt

original: 03116 na hy asya sambhavo yathāvasthita-vastu-sthitiṣv ātma-kārya-anupalambheṣu.
analyzed: na hi asya sambhavaḥ yathā avasthita vastu sthitiṣu ātma kārya anupalambheṣu
tatra udāharaṇam

original: yat sarva-deśa-avasthitaiḥ sva-sambandhibhir yugapad abhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam,
analyzed: yat sarva deśa avasthitaiḥ sva sambandhibhiḥ yugapad abhisambadhyate tat sarvagatam

original: yathā ākāśam. abhisambadhyate ca sarva-deśa-avasthitaiḥ sva-sambandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti.
analyzed: yathā ākāśam abhisambadhyate ca sarva deśa avasthitaiḥ sva sambandhibhiḥ yugapad sāmānyam iti
tad sambandhi svabhāva mātra anubandhinī tad deśa saṃnihita svabhāva tā

original: 03119 na hi yo yatra na asti tad-deśam ātmanā vyāpnoti iti svabhāvahetu-prayogaḥ.
analyzed: na hi yaḥ yatra na asti tad deśam ātmanā vyāpnoti iti svabhāva hetu prayogaḥ
dvitīyaḥ api prayogaḥ

original: yad upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ san na upalabhyate na tat tatra asti. tad yathā,
analyzed: yat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sat na upalabhyate na tat tatra asti tat yathā

original: kvacid avidyamāno ghaṭaḥ. na upalabhyate ca upalabdhi-lakṣaṇa-prāptaṃ sāmānyaṃ vyakty-antarāleṣv
analyzed: kvacid avidyamānaḥ ghaṭaḥ na upalabhyate ca upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sāmānyam vyakti antarāleṣu

original: iti. ayam anupalambhaḥ svabhāvaś ca paraspara-viruddha-artha-sādhanād ekatra saṃśayaṃ janayataḥ.
analyzed: iti ayam anupalambhaḥ svabhāvaḥ ca paraspara viruddha artha sādhanāt ekatra saṃśayam janayataḥ

original: 03121 trirūpo hetur uktaḥ. tāvatā ca artha-pratītir iti na pṛthag dṛṣṭānto nāma sādhana-avayavaḥ kaścid. tena na asya lakṣaṇaṃ pṛthag ucyate
analyzed: trirūpaḥ hetuḥ uktaḥ tāvatā ca artha pratītiḥ iti na pṛthak dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma sādhana avayavaḥ kaścid tena na asya lakṣaṇam pṛthak ucyate

original: 03122 hetoḥ sapakṣa eva sattvam asapakṣāc ca sarvato vyāvṛttī rūpam uktam abhedena.
analyzed: hetoḥ sapakṣaḥ eva sattvam a sapakṣāt ca sarvatas vyāvṛttiḥ rūpam uktam abhedena

original: punar viśeṣeṇa kārya-svabhāvayor ukta-lakṣaṇayor janma-tan-mātra-anubandhau darśanīya-avaktau. tac ca darśayatā,
analyzed: punar viśeṣeṇa kārya svabhāvayoḥ ukta lakṣaṇayoḥ janma tanmātra anubandhau darśanīya avaktau tat ca darśayatā
yatra dhūmaḥ tatra agniḥ

original: asaty agnau na kvacid dhūmo yathā mahānasa-itarayoḥ,
analyzed: asati agnau na kvacid dhūmaḥ yathā mahānasa aitarayoḥ
yatra kṛtaka tvam tatra anitya tvam
anitya tva abhāvaḥ kṛtaka tva asambhavaḥ yathā
ghaṭa ākāśayoḥ

original: iti darśanīyam. na hy anyathā sapakṣa-vipakṣayoḥ sadasattve yathokta-prakāre śakye darśayitum. tat kāryatā-niyamaḥ kārya-liṅgasya
analyzed: iti darśanīyam na hi anyathā sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ sat asat tve yathā ukta prakāre śakye darśayitum tat kārya tā niyamaḥ kārya liṅgasya

original: svabhāva-liṅgasya ca svabhāvena vyāptiḥ. asmiṃś ca arthe darśite darśita eva dṛṣṭānto bhavati. etāvān mātra-rūpatvāt tasya iti.
analyzed: svabhāva liṅgasya ca svabhāvena vyāptiḥ asmin ca arthe darśite darśitaḥ eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ bhavati etāvān mātra rūpa tvāt tasya iti

original: 03123 etena eva dṛṣṭānta-doṣā api nirastā bhavanti.
analyzed: etena eva dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ api nirastāḥ bhavanti

original: 03124 yathā nityaḥ śabdo amūrtatvāt. karma-vat paramāṇu-vad ghaṭa-vad iti. ete dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ sādhya-sādhana-dharma-ubhaya-vikalāḥ.
analyzed: yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ amūrta tvāt karmavat paramāṇu vat ghaṭa vat iti ete dṛṣṭānta ābhāsāḥ sādhya sādhana dharma obhaya vikalāḥ
tathā sandigdha sādhya dharma ādayaḥ ca

original: yathā rāga-ādimān ayaṃ vacanād rathyā-puruṣa-vat. maraṇa-dharmo ayaṃ puruṣo rāga-ādimattvād rathyā-puruṣa-vat. asarvajño ayaṃ rāga-ādimatvād  #
analyzed: yathā rāga ādimān ayam vacanāt rathyā puruṣa vat maraṇa dharmaḥ ayam puruṣaḥ rāga ādimat tvāt rathyā puruṣa vat asarvajñaḥ ayam rāga ādima tvāt
rathyā puruṣa vat iti
tathā ananvayaḥ apradarśita anvayaḥ ca
yathā sa rāgaādimān

original: iṣṭa-puruṣa-vat. anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭa-vad iti.
analyzed: iṣṭa puruṣa vat anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ghaṭa vat iti
tathā viparīta anvayaḥ
yat anityam tat kṛtakam iti
sādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭānta doṣāḥ
vaidharmyeṇa api
tathā sandigdha sādhya vyatireka ādayaḥ

original: yathā asarvajñāḥ kapila-ādayo anāptā vā avidyamāna-sarvajñatā-āptatā-liṅgabhūta-pramāṇa-atiśaya-śāsanatvād iti. atra vaidharmya-udāharaṇam,
analyzed: yathā asarvajñāḥ kapila ādayaḥ anāptāḥ vā avidyamāna sarvajña tā āpta tā liṅga bhūta pramāṇa atiśaya śāsana tvāt iti atra vaidharmya audāharaṇam

original: yaḥ sarvajña āpto vā sa jyotir-jñāna-ādikam upadiṣṭavān,
analyzed: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ āptaḥ vā sa jyotiḥ jñāna ādikam upadiṣṭavān

original: yathā ṛṣabha-vardhamāna-ādir iti. tatra asarvajñatā anāptayoḥ sādhya-dharmayoḥ sandigdho vyatirekaḥ.
analyzed: yathā ṛṣabha vardhamāna ādiḥ iti tatra asarvajña tā anāptayoḥ sādhya dharmayoḥ sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ
sandigdha sādhana vyatirekaḥ yathā

original: na trayīvidā brāhmaṇena grāhya-vacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣo rāga-ādimattvād iti. atra vaidharmya-udāharaṇam,
analyzed: na trayī vidā brāhmaṇena grāhya vacanaḥ kaścid vivakṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ rāga ādimat tvāt iti atra vaidharmya audāharaṇam

original: ye grāhya-vacanā na te rāga-ādimantaḥ. tad yathā gautama-ādayo dharma-śāstrāṇāṃ praṇetāra iti. gautama-ādibhyo rāga-ādimattvasya sādhana-dharmasya  #
analyzed: ye grāhya vacanāḥ na te rāga ādimantaḥ tat yathā gautama ādayaḥ dharma śāstrāṇām praṇetāraḥ iti gautama ādibhyaḥ rāga ādimat tvasya sādhana dharmasya
vyāvṛttiḥ sandigdhā
sandigdha aubhaya vyatirekaḥ yathā
a vīta rāgāḥ kapila ādayaḥ
parigraha a agraha yogāt iti atra vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam
yaḥ vīta rāgaḥ na tasya parigrahaḥ āgrahaḥ

original: yathā ṛṣabha-āder iti. ṛṣabha-āder avīta-rāgatva-parigraha-āgraha-yogayoḥ sādhya-sādhana-dharmayoḥ sandigdho vyatirekaḥ.
analyzed: yathā ṛṣabha ādeḥ iti ṛṣabha ādeḥ avīta rāga tva parigraha agraha yogayoḥ sādhya sādhana dharmayoḥ sandigdhaḥ vyatirekaḥ
avyatirekaḥ yathā
avīta rāgaḥ ayam vaktṛ tvāt vaidharmyeṇa udāharaṇam

original: yatra avīta-rāgatvaṃ na asti na sa vaktā,
analyzed: yatra avīta rāga tvam na asti na sa vaktā

original: yathā upala-khaṇḍa iti. yady apy upala-khaṇḍād ubhayaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ tathā api sarvo vīta-rāgo na vaktā iti vyāptyā vyatireka-asiddher avyatirekaḥ.
analyzed: yathā upala khaṇḍaḥ iti yadi api upala khaṇḍāt ubhayam vyāvṛttam tathā api sarvaḥ vīta rāgaḥ na vaktā iti vyāptyāḥ vyatireka asiddheḥ avyatirekaḥ
apradarśita vyatirekaḥ yathā
anityaḥ śabdaḥ
kṛtaka tvāt ākāśa vat iti vaidharmyeṇa
viparīta vyatirekaḥ yathā

original: yad akṛtakaṃ tan nityaṃ bhavati iti.
analyzed: yat akṛtakam tat nityam bhavati iti

original: 03136 na hy ebhir dṛṣṭāntābhāsāir hetoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ vipakṣe
analyzed: na hi ebhiḥ dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaiḥ hetoḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇam sapakṣe eva sattvam vipakṣe

original: ca sarvatra asattvam eva niścayena śakyaṃ darśayituṃ viśeṣa-lakṣaṇaṃ vā. tad arthāpattyā
analyzed: ca sarvatra asattvam eva niścayena śakyam darśayitum viśeṣa lakṣaṇam vā tat arthāpattyā
eṣām nirāsaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ

original: 03138 ye pūrvaṃ nyūnatā-ādayaḥ sādhana-doṣā uktās teṣām udbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇam. tena para-iṣṭa-artha-siddhi-pratibandhāt.
analyzed: ye pūrvam nyūna tā ādayaḥ sādhana doṣāḥ uktāḥ teṣām udbhāvanam dūṣaṇam tena para eṣṭa artha siddhi pratibandhāt
dūṣaṇa ābhāsāḥ tu jātayaḥ
